pli-tv-kd9:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā campāyaṃ viharati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena kāsīsu janapade vāsabhagāmo nāma hoti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.3: Tattha kassapagotto nāma bhikkhu āvāsiko hoti tantibaddho ussukkaṃ āpanno—
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.4: “kinti anāgatā ca pesalā bhikkhū āgaccheyyuṃ, āgatā ca pesalā bhikkhū phāsu vihareyyuṃ, ayañca āvāso vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu cārikaṃ caramānā yena vāsabhagāmo tadavasaruṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.6: Addasā kho kassapagotto bhikkhu te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante, disvāna āsanaṃ paññapesi, pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ pādakathalikaṃ upanikkhipi, paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi, pānīyena āpucchi, nahāne ussukkaṃ akāsi, ussukkampi akāsi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.7: Atha kho tesaṃ āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.8: “bhaddako kho ayaṃ, āvuso, āvāsiko bhikkhu nahāne ussukkaṃ karoti, ussukkampi karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.9: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, idheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṃ kappemā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.10: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū tattheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṃ kappesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.2: “yo kho imesaṃ āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgantukakilamatho so paṭippassaddho.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.3: Yepime gocare appakataññuno tedānime gocare pakataññuno.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.4: Dukkaraṃ kho pana parakulesu yāvajīvaṃ ussukkaṃ kātuṃ, viññatti ca manussānaṃ amanāpā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.5: Yannūnāhaṃ na ussukkaṃ kareyyaṃ yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmin”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.6: So na ussukkaṃ akāsi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.7: Atha kho tesaṃ āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.8: “pubbe khvāyaṃ, āvuso, āvāsiko bhikkhu nahāne ussukkaṃ akāsi, ussukkampi akāsi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.9: Sodānāyaṃ na ussukkaṃ karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.11: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, āvāsikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ukkhipāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.1: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū sannipatitvā kassapagottaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.2: “pubbe kho tvaṃ, āvuso, nahāne ussukkaṃ karosi, ussukkampi karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.3: Sodāni tvaṃ na ussukkaṃ karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.7: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū kassapagottaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.9: “ahaṃ kho etaṃ na jānāmi ‘āpatti vā esā anāpatti vā, āpanno camhi anāpanno vā, ukkhitto camhi anukkhitto vā, dhammikena vā adhammikena vā, kuppena vā akuppena vā, ṭhānārahena vā aṭṭhānārahena vā’.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.10: Yannūnāhaṃ campaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.1: Atha kho kassapagotto bhikkhu senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena campā tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.2: Anupubbena yena campā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.3: Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodituṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.4: Atha kho bhagavā kassapagottaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.1: Atthi, bhante, kāsīsu janapade vāsabhagāmo nāma.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.2: Tatthāhaṃ, bhagavā, āvāsiko tantibaddho ussukkaṃ āpanno—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.3: ‘kinti anāgatā ca pesalā bhikkhū āgaccheyyuṃ, āgatā ca pesalā bhikkhū phāsu vihareyyuṃ, ayañca āvāso vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjeyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.4: Atha kho, bhante, sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu cārikaṃ caramānā yena vāsabhagāmo tadavasaruṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.5: Addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante, disvāna āsanaṃ paññapesiṃ, pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ pādakathalikaṃ upanikkhipiṃ, paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesiṃ, pānīyena apucchiṃ, nahāne ussukkaṃ akāsiṃ, ussukkampi akāsiṃ yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.6: Atha kho tesaṃ, bhante, āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.7: ‘bhaddako kho ayaṃ āvuso āvāsiko bhikkhu nahāne ussukkaṃ karoti, ussukkampi karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.8: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, idheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṃ kappemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.9: Atha kho te, bhante, āgantukā bhikkhū tattheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṃ kappesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.11: ‘yo kho imesaṃ āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgantukakilamatho so paṭippassaddho.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.12: Yepime gocare appakataññuno tedānime gocare pakataññuno.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.13: Dukkaraṃ kho pana parakulesu yāvajīvaṃ ussukkaṃ kātuṃ, viññatti ca manussānaṃ amanāpā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.14: Yannūnāhaṃ na ussukkaṃ kareyyaṃ yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmin’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.15: So kho ahaṃ, bhante, na ussukkaṃ akāsiṃ yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.16: Atha kho tesaṃ, bhante, āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.17: ‘pubbe khvāyaṃ, āvuso, āvāsiko bhikkhu nahāne ussukkaṃ karoti, ussukkampi karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.18: Sodānāyaṃ na ussukkaṃ karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.20: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, āvāsikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ukkhipāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.21: Atha kho te, bhante, āgantukā bhikkhū sannipatitvā maṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.22: ‘pubbe kho tvaṃ, āvuso, nahāne ussukkaṃ karosi, ussukkampi karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.23: Sodāni tvaṃ na ussukkaṃ karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.27: Atha kho te, bhante, āgantukā bhikkhū maṃ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.29: ‘ahaṃ kho etaṃ na jānāmi “āpatti vā esā anāpatti vā, āpanno camhi anāpanno vā, ukkhitto camhi anukkhitto vā, dhammikena vā adhammikena vā, kuppena vā akuppena vā, ṭhānārahena vā aṭṭhānārahena vā”.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.30: Yannūnāhaṃ campaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.6.5: Gaccha tvaṃ, bhikkhu, tattheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṃ kappehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.6.6: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho kassapagotto bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā yena vāsabhagāmo tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.1: Atha kho tesaṃ āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ahudeva kukkuccaṃ, ahu vippaṭisāro—
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.2: “alābhā vata no, na vata no lābhā;
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.3: dulladdhaṃ vata no, na vata no suladdhaṃ, ye mayaṃ suddhaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpattikaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ukkhipimhā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.4: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, campaṃ gantvā bhagavato santike accayaṃ accayato desemā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.5: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena campā tena pakkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.6: Anupubbena yena campā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.7: Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodituṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.8: Atha kho bhagavā te bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.13: appakilamathena ca mayaṃ, bhante, addhānaṃ āgatā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.14: Atthi, bhante, kāsīsu janapade vāsabhagāmo nāma.
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.6: “ananucchavikaṃ, moghapurisā, ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.7: Kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, suddhaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpattikaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ukkhipissatha.
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.9: vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.10: “na, bhikkhave, suddho bhikkhu anāpattiko avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.2: “accayo no, bhante, accagamā yathābāle yathāmūḷhe yathāakusale, ye mayaṃ suddhaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpattikaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ukkhipimhā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.3: Tesaṃ no, bhante, bhagavā accayaṃ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṃ saṃvarāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.4: “Taggha tumhe, bhikkhave, accayo accagamā yathābāle yathāmūḷhe yathāakusale, ye tumhe suddhaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpattikaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe ukkhipittha.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.5: Yato ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikarotha, taṃ vo mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.6: Vuddhihesā, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti, āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena campāyaṃ bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.2: adhammena vaggakammaṃ karonti, adhammena samaggakammaṃ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.3: dhammena vaggakammaṃ karonti, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.5: ekopi ekaṃ ukkhipati, ekopi dve ukkhipati, ekopi sambahule ukkhipati, ekopi saṃghaṃ ukkhipati;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.6: dvepi ekaṃ ukkhipanti, dvepi dve ukkhipanti, dvepi sambahule ukkhipanti, dvepi saṃghaṃ ukkhipanti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.8: sambahulāpi dve ukkhipanti, sambahulāpi sambahule ukkhipanti, sambahulāpi saṃghaṃ ukkhipanti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.1: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.2: “kathañhi nāma campāyaṃ bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karissanti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.3: adhammena vaggakammaṃ karissanti, adhammena samaggakammaṃ karissanti, dhammena vaggakammaṃ karissanti, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ karissanti, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ karissanti, ekopi ekaṃ ukkhipissati, ekopi dve ukkhipissati, ekopi sambahule ukkhipissati, ekopi saṃghaṃ ukkhipissati, dvepi ekaṃ ukkhipissanti, dvepi dve ukkhipissanti, dvepi sambahule ukkhipissanti, dvepi saṃghaṃ ukkhipissanti, sambahulāpi ekaṃ ukkhipissanti, sambahulāpi dve ukkhipissanti, sambahulāpi sambahule ukkhipissanti, sambahulāpi saṃghaṃ ukkhipissanti, saṃghopi saṃghaṃ ukkhipissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.4: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, campāyaṃ bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.10: “ananucchavikaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ moghapurisānaṃ ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.11: Kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā evarūpāni kammāni karissanti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.1: “Adhammena ce, bhikkhave, vaggakammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.2: adhammena samaggakammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.3: dhammena vaggakammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.4: dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.5: dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.6: ekopi ekaṃ ukkhipati akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.7: ekopi dve ukkhipati akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.8: ekopi sambahule ukkhipati akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.9: ekopi saṃghaṃ ukkhipati akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.10: dvepi ekaṃ ukkhipanti akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.11: dvepi dve ukkhipanti akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.12: dvepi sambahule ukkhipanti akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.13: dvepi saṃghaṃ ukkhipanti akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.14: sambahulāpi ekaṃ ukkhipanti akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.15: sambahulāpi dve ukkhipanti akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.16: sambahulāpi sambahule ukkhipanti akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.17: sambahulāpi saṃghaṃ ukkhipanti akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.18: saṃghopi saṃghaṃ ukkhipati akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.2: adhammena vaggakammaṃ, adhammena samaggakammaṃ, dhammena vaggakammaṃ, dhammena samaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṃ adhammena vaggakammaṃ, idaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ adhammattā vaggattā kuppaṃ aṭṭhānārahaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.4: na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ kammaṃ kātabbaṃ, na ca mayā evarūpaṃ kammaṃ anuññātaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.5: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṃ adhammena samaggakammaṃ, idaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ adhammattā kuppaṃ aṭṭhānārahaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.6: na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ kammaṃ kātabbaṃ, na ca mayā evarūpaṃ kammaṃ anuññātaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.7: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṃ dhammena vaggakammaṃ, idaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ vaggattā kuppaṃ aṭṭhānārahaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.8: na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ kammaṃ kātabbaṃ, na ca mayā evarūpaṃ kammaṃ anuññātaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.9: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidaṃ dhammena samaggakammaṃ, idaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ dhammattā samaggattā akuppaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.10: evarūpaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ kātabbaṃ, evarūpañca mayā kammaṃ anuññātaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.11: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ kammaṃ karissāma yadidaṃ dhammena samagganti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.2: adhammena vaggakammaṃ karonti, adhammena samaggakammaṃ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.3: dhammena vaggakammaṃ karonti, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ karonti, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.4: ñattivipannampi kammaṃ karonti anussāvanasampannaṃ, anussāvanavipannampi kammaṃ karonti ñattisampannaṃ, ñattivipannampi anussāvanavipannampi kammaṃ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.5: aññatrāpi dhammā kammaṃ karonti, aññatrāpi vinayā kammaṃ karonti, aññatrāpi satthusāsanā kammaṃ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.6: paṭikuṭṭhakatampi kammaṃ karonti adhammikaṃ kuppaṃ aṭṭhānārahaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karissanti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.9: adhammena vaggakammaṃ karissanti, adhammena samaggakammaṃ karissanti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.10: dhammena vaggakammaṃ karissanti, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ karissanti, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ karissanti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.11: ñattivipannampi kammaṃ karissanti anussāvanasampannaṃ, anussāvanavipannampi kammaṃ karissanti ñattisampannaṃ, ñattivipannampi anussāvanavipannampi kammaṃ karissanti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.12: aññatrāpi dhammā kammaṃ karissanti, aññatrāpi vinayā kammaṃ karissanti, aññatrāpi satthusāsanā kammaṃ karissanti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.13: paṭikuṭṭhakatampi kammaṃ karissanti adhammikaṃ kuppaṃ aṭṭhānārahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.14: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.15: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.17: paṭikuṭṭhakatampi kammaṃ karonti adhammikaṃ kuppaṃ aṭṭhānārahan”ti?
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.20: vigarahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.1: “Adhammena ce, bhikkhave, vaggakammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.2: adhammena samaggakammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.3: dhammena vaggakammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.4: dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.5: dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.6: Ñattivipannañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ anussāvanasampannaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.7: anussāvanavipannañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ ñattisampannaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.8: ñattivipannañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ anussāvanavipannaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.9: aññatrāpi dhammā kammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.10: aññatrāpi vinayā kammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.11: aññatrāpi satthusāsanā kammaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.12: paṭikuṭṭhakatañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ adhammikaṃ kuppaṃ aṭṭhānārahaṃ akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.3.2: adhammakammaṃ, vaggakammaṃ, samaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ, dhammena samaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.3.4: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekāya ñattiyā kammaṃ karoti, na ca kammavācaṃ anussāveti—adhammakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.3.5: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme dvīhi ñattīhi kammaṃ karoti, na ca kammavācaṃ anussāveti—adhammakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.3.6: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekāya kammavācāya kammaṃ karoti, na ca ñattiṃ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.3.7: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme dvīhi kammavācāhi kammaṃ karoti, na ca ñattiṃ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.1: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekāya ñattiyā kammaṃ karoti, na ca kammavācaṃ anussāveti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.3: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme dvīhi ñattīhi kammaṃ karoti, na ca kammavācaṃ anussāveti—adhammakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.4: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme tīhi ñattīhi kammaṃ karoti, na ca kammavācaṃ anussāveti—adhammakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.5: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme catūhi ñattīhi kammaṃ karoti, na ca kammavācaṃ anussāveti—adhammakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.6: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme ekāya kammavācāya kammaṃ karoti, na ca ñattiṃ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.7: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme dvīhi kammavācāhi kammaṃ karoti, na ca ñattiṃ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.8: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme tīhi kammavācāhi kammaṃ karoti, na ca ñattiṃ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.4.9: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme catūhi kammavācāhi kammaṃ karoti, na ca ñattiṃ ṭhapeti—adhammakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.2: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.3: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.4: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.5: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.6: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.5.7: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.6.2: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—samaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.6.3: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—samaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.2: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.3: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.4: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.5: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.6: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.7.7: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.8.2: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.8.3: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ anussāveti, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.9.2: Ñattidutiye ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, pacchā ekāya kammavācāya kammaṃ karoti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—dhammena samaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.9.3: Ñatticatutthe ce, bhikkhave, kamme paṭhamaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, pacchā tīhi kammavācāhi kammaṃ karoti, yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti, dhammena samaggakammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.2: catuvaggo bhikkhusaṃgho pañcavaggo bhikkhusaṃgho, dasavaggo bhikkhusaṃgho, vīsativaggo bhikkhusaṃgho, atirekavīsativaggo bhikkhusaṃgho.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ catuvaggo bhikkhusaṃgho, ṭhapetvā tīṇi kammāni—
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.4: upasampadaṃ pavāraṇaṃ abbhānaṃ, dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.5: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ pañcavaggo bhikkhusaṃgho, ṭhapetvā dve kammāni—
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.6: majjhimesu janapadesu upasampadaṃ abbhānaṃ, dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.7: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ dasavaggo bhikkhusaṃgho, ṭhapetvā ekaṃ kammaṃ—
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.9: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ vīsativaggo bhikkhusaṃgho dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.10: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ atirekavīsativaggo bhikkhusaṃgho dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.1: Catuvaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ bhikkhunicatuttho kammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.3: Catuvaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ sikkhamānacatuttho kammaṃ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.17: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittakacatuttho kammaṃ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.47: Yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti, taṃcatuttho kammaṃ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.3.2: Pañcavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ bhikkhunipañcamo kammaṃ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.3.4: Pañcavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ sikkhamānapañcamo kammaṃ kareyya …pe….
pli-tv-kd9:4.3.11: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittakapañcamo kammaṃ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.3.26: yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti, taṃpañcamo kammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.4.2: Dasavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ bhikkhunidasamo kammaṃ kareyya, akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:4.4.3: Dasavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ sikkhamānadasamo kammaṃ kareyya, akammaṃ na ca karaṇīyaṃ …
pli-tv-kd9:4.4.5: Dasavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti, taṃdasamo kammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.5.2: Vīsativaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ bhikkhunivīso kammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.5.4: Vīsativaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṃ sikkhamānavīso kammaṃ kareyya …pe…
pli-tv-kd9:4.5.11: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittakavīso kammaṃ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.5.26: yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti, taṃvīso kammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.6.3: Pārivāsikacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, parivāsaṃ dadeyya, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mānattaṃ dadeyya, taṃvīso abbheyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.6.5: Mūlāyapaṭikassanārahacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, parivāsaṃ dadeyya, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mānattaṃ dadeyya, taṃvīso abbheyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.6.7: Mānattārahacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, parivāsaṃ dadeyya, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mānattaṃ dadeyya, taṃvīso abbheyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.6.9: Mānattacārikacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, parivāsaṃ dadeyya, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mānattaṃ dadeyya, taṃvīso abbheyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.6.11: Abbhānārahacatuttho ce, bhikkhave, parivāsaṃ dadeyya, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mānattaṃ dadeyya, taṃvīso abbheyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.1: Ekaccassa, bhikkhave, saṃghamajjhe paṭikkosanā ruhati, ekaccassa na ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.2: Kassa ca, bhikkhave, saṃghamajjhe paṭikkosanā na ruhati?
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.3: Bhikkhuniyā, bhikkhave, saṃghamajjhe paṭikkosanā na ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.28: iddhiyā vehāse ṭhitassa, bhikkhave, yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti, tassa ca, bhikkhave, saṃghamajjhe paṭikkosanā na ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.29: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, saṃghamajjhe paṭikkosanā na ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.8.1: Kassa ca, bhikkhave, saṃghamajjhe paṭikkosanā ruhati?
pli-tv-kd9:4.8.2: Bhikkhussa, bhikkhave, pakatattassa samānasaṃvāsakassa samānasīmāya ṭhitassa antamaso ānantarikassāpi bhikkhuno viññāpentassa saṃghamajjhe paṭikkosanā ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.3: Tañce saṃgho nissāreti, ekacco sunissārito, ekacco dunnissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.4: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho nissāreti—dunnissārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suddho hoti anāpattiko.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.6: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho nissāreti—dunnissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.7: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho nissāreti—unissārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.8: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno, gihisaṃsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikehi gihisaṃsaggehi, tañce saṃgho nissāreti—sunissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.9: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho nissāreti—sunissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṃ tañce saṃgho osāreti, ekacco sosārito, ekacco dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.3: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho osāreti—dosārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.4: Paṇḍako, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.5: Theyyasaṃvāsako, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.14: ubhatobyañjanako, bhikkhave, appatto, osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.15: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.16: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, puggalā appattā osāraṇaṃ, te ce saṃgho osāreti—dosāritā.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho osāreti—sosārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.2: Hatthacchinno, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho osāreti, sosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.33: andhamūgabadhiro, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho osāreti—sosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.34: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṃ, tañce saṃgho osāreti—sosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.35: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, puggalā appattā osāraṇaṃ, te ce saṃgho osāreti—sosāritā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti āpatti daṭṭhabbā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.2: Tamenaṃ codeti saṃgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā—
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.8: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti āpatti paṭikātabbā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.9: Tamenaṃ codeti saṃgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā—
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.10: ‘āpattiṃ tvaṃ, āvuso, āpanno, paṭikarohi taṃ āpattin’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.15: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti pāpikā diṭṭhi paṭinissajjetā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.16: Tamenaṃ codeti saṃgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā—
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.17: ‘pāpikā te, āvuso, diṭṭhi, paṭinissajjetaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhin’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.19: ‘natthi me, āvuso, pāpikā diṭṭhi, yamahaṃ paṭinissajjeyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.20: Taṃ saṃgho pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhipati—
pli-tv-kd9:5.2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti āpatti daṭṭhabbā, na hoti āpatti paṭikātabbā.

pli-tv-kd9:5.2.7: Natthi me, āvuso, āpatti, yamahaṃ paṭikareyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:5.2.8: Taṃ saṃgho adassane vā appaṭikamme vā ukkhipati—

pli-tv-kd9:6.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā upāli yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd9:6.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā upāli bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd9:6.1.3: “yo nu kho, bhante, samaggo saṃgho sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ asammukhā karoti, dhammakammaṃ nu kho taṃ, bhante, vinayakamman”ti?
pli-tv-kd9:6.2.1: “Yo nu kho, bhante, samaggo saṃgho paṭipucchākaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ appaṭipucchā karoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd9:6.2.14: abbhānārahaṃ upasampādeti, dhammakammaṃ nu kho taṃ, bhante, vinayakamman”ti?

pli-tv-kd9:6.5.1: “Yo nu kho, bhante, samaggo saṃgho sativinayārahassa amūḷhavinayaṃ deti, amūḷhavinayārahassa sativinayaṃ deti, dhammakammaṃ nu kho taṃ, bhante, vinayakamman”ti?
pli-tv-kd9:6.5.3: “Yo nu kho, bhante, samaggo saṃgho amūḷhavinayārahassa tassapāpiyasikākammaṃ karoti, tassapāpiyasikākammārahassa amūḷhavinayaṃ deti …pe…
pli-tv-kd9:6.5.4: tassapāpiyasikākammārahassa tajjanīyakammaṃ karoti, tajjanīyakammārahassa tassapāpiyasikākammaṃ karoti …
pli-tv-kd9:6.5.5: tajjanīyakammārahassa niyassakammaṃ karoti, niyassakammārahassa tajjanīyakammaṃ karoti …
pli-tv-kd9:6.5.6: niyassakammārahassa pabbājanīyakammaṃ karoti, pabbājanīyakammārahassa niyassakammaṃ karoti …
pli-tv-kd9:6.5.7: pabbājanīyakammārahassa paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ karoti, paṭisāraṇīyakammārahassa pabbājanīyakammaṃ karoti …

pli-tv-kd9:6.5.9: ukkhepanīyakammārahassa parivāsaṃ deti, parivāsārahassa ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karoti …
pli-tv-kd9:6.5.10: parivāsārahaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati, mūlāyapaṭikassanārahassa parivāsaṃ deti …
pli-tv-kd9:6.5.11: mūlāyapaṭikassanārahassa mānattaṃ deti, mānattārahaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati …
pli-tv-kd9:6.5.13: abbhānārahaṃ upasampādeti, upasampadārahaṃ abbheti, dhammakammaṃ nu kho taṃ, bhante, vinayakamman”ti?

pli-tv-kd9:7.1.1: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako.
pli-tv-kd9:7.1.3: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako.
pli-tv-kd9:7.1.7: So tamhā āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ gacchati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.1.9: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena tajjanīyakammakato adhammena vaggehi.

pli-tv-kd9:7.1.19: So tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ gacchati.

pli-tv-kd9:7.6.3: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu bālo abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno, gihisaṃsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikehi gihisaṃsaggehi.

pli-tv-kd9:7.8.3: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu gihī akkosati paribhāsati.

pli-tv-kd9:7.8.9: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato adhammena vaggehi.
pli-tv-kd9:7.9.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ passituṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:7.9.3: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ passituṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:7.9.4: Handassa mayaṃ āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karomā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.9.5: Te tassa āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.9.7: So tamhā āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ gacchati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.9.9: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakato adhammena vaggehi.

pli-tv-kd9:7.9.11: Te tassa āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.10.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ paṭikātuṃ.

pli-tv-kd9:7.10.7: So tamhā āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ gacchati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.10.9: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakato adhammena vaggehi.

pli-tv-kd9:7.11.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na icchati pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjituṃ.
pli-tv-kd9:7.11.3: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu na icchati pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjituṃ.

pli-tv-kd9:7.11.5: Te tassa pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṃ karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.11.7: So tamhā āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ gacchati.

pli-tv-kd9:7.12.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃghena tajjanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, tajjanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd9:7.14.52: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.14.54: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.14.55: Handassa mayaṃ āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.14.56: Te tassa āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhenti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.14.58: So tamhā āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ gacchati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.14.60: ‘imassa kho, āvuso, bhikkhuno saṃghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassaddhaṃ adhammena vaggehi.

pli-tv-kd9:7.14.62: Te tassa āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhenti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.14.69: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd9:7.20.12: ‘adhammena vaggakammaṃ, adhammena samaggakammaṃ, dhammena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ, akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.13: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.14: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.15: ‘akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti, ime tattha bhikkhū dhammavādino.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.18: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.20: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.29: ‘adhammena vaggakammaṃ, adhammena samaggakammaṃ, dhammena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ, akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.30: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.31: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.32: ‘akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti, ime tattha bhikkhū dhammavādino.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.35: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.37: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.46: ‘adhammena vaggakammaṃ, adhammena samaggakammaṃ, dhammena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ, akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.47: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.48: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.49: ‘akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.53: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.55: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.56: Handassa mayaṃ āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.57: Te tassa āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhenti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.64: ‘adhammena vaggakammaṃ, adhammena samaggakammaṃ, dhammena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ, akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.65: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.66: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.67: ‘akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti, ime tattha bhikkhū dhammavādino.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.70: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.72: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.73: Handassa mayaṃ āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.74: Te tassa āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhenti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.81: ‘adhammena vaggakammaṃ, adhammena samaggakammaṃ, dhammena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ, akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.82: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.83: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.84: ‘akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti, ime tattha bhikkhū dhammavādino.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.87: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃghena pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.89: ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṃ pāteti, netthāraṃ vattati, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.90: Handassa mayaṃ pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.91: Te tassa pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṃ paṭippassambhenti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.98: ‘adhammena vaggakammaṃ, adhammena samaggakammaṃ, dhammena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṃ, dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṃ, akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.99: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.100: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.101: ‘akataṃ kammaṃ dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamman’ti, ime tattha bhikkhū dhammavādino.
